'''Genshin Symphony''' is a collection of in-person concerts playing ''[[Genshin Impact]]'''s well-loved [[soundtrack]]s, directed by Sachiko Miyano and performed by multiple Japanese orchestras, including Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra, Osaka Symphony Orchestra, and Nagoya Philharmonic Orchestra.

[[Genshin Symphony (CD Set)|A blue-ray video CD recording]] of the Yokohama concert, which took place on February 11, 2023, was released on September 6, 2023.

==Description== 
<!--オープンワールドRPG「原神」で
奏でられる至高の楽曲群を、
フルオーケストラで再現。

幻想的な情景とともに、
テイワット大陸での物語を体感できます。

「原神Symphony」という、宝箱が開くとき。
旅人の皆様の、心躍る冒険の始まりです。-->
In the open world RPG ''Genshin Impact''
a group of supreme songs that can be played,
reproduced with a full orchestra.

With a fantastic scene,
you can experience the story of Teyvat.

When a treasure chest called "Genshin Symphony" opens.
This is the beginning of an exciting adventure for all travelers.
